title: Teacher and technology
creator_contributor_role: South Australian Film Corporation, production company
subject_group: Education, Instruction, Teaching & Schools/Teaching - Aids and devices
description: Aims to promote technology awarness in teachers. Changes in needs and methods have led to a greater use of technology in the classroom, especially for self-paced learning. The practical applications of equipment are discussed. Children from four South Australian primary schools participated in the production. Essentially a promotion of the South Australian Educational Technology Centre. It emphasizes the need to teach using 1980s technology. Hardware covered includes over-head projectors, computers, video, film.
